original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy an apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁kati hi ▁ samuṭṭhān ehi ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy an apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁ekena ▁ samuṭṭhān ena ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe….
Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñja n apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁kati hi ▁ samuṭṭhān ehi ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñja n apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁catūhi ▁ samuṭṭhān ehi ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
